title: Quincy University Uses Jenzabar EX to Improve the Student Experience
text:
Quincy University Uses Jenzabar EX to Improve the Student Experience [October 01, 2015] Tweet 
JenzabarÂ®, Inc., a leading provider of software, strategies, and services for higher education, today announced that Quincy University selected Jenzabar EX, an industry-leading enterprise resource planning system designed specifically for higher education. Jenzabar EX gives Quincy University improved student-facing tools, better data analytics, and streamlined administrative processes. 
"Quincy University strives to provide a high quality student experience coupled with rigorous academic programs," said Tony Hayes, Director of Information Technology at Quincy University. "We need to provide simple and easy-to-use tools to our students to make tasks as easy as shopping online, for instance class registration. Jenzabar's student portal will significantly improve the student experience by simplifying many processes and providing a centralized point of service." 
One of the key benefits for Quincy University is an integrated package from a single vendor and a single data source used by all the components, reducing issues with propagation delays or duplicate data. Implementing Jenzabar EX has afforded the University an opportunity to review and revise administrative processes, which will help staff be more effective and improve the student experience. The software has also given Quincy the ability to quickly and easily access data for analysis, helping staff make more informed, data-driven decisions n a more timely fashion. 
"Jenzabar EX provides us accurate and timely data to allow us to be more agile in making data-driven decisions about our programs," said Hayes. "The Jenzabar team was helpful in bringing best practices to the table during our training, assisting us in our efforts to improve our processes and provide the best possible educational opportunities and outcomes. Jenzabar EX gives us the agility we need to stay effective and competitive in the rapidly evolving higher education arena." 
"Quincy University can now leverage Jenzabar's set of tools to be more effective in serving their student population and directly impact the student experience," said Sam Burgio, VP and General Manager of the Jenzabar EX Business Unit. "Many institutions, similar to Quincy, are finding value with a single source, integrated solution to help with overall efficiency and simplicity. Quincy knows they can rely on Jenzabar for all of their IT needs." 
About Quincy University Quincy University (QU) is a private liberal arts Catholic university located in Quincy, Illinois. The University enrolls 1,300 students and is known for its commitment to service learning and the Franciscan tradition. For more information, please visit http://www.quincy.edu . 
About Jenzabar, Inc. Jenzabar, Inc. is a leading provider of enterprise software, strategies, and services developed exclusively for higher education. The company offers integrated, innovative solutions to advance the goals of academic and administrative offices across the campus and throughout the student lifecycle. As a trusted partner serving more than 1,000 campuses worldwide, Jenzabar has over four decades of experience supporting the higher education community. Jenzabar is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts. For further information, please visit www.jenzabar.com .
